thread.section_title: ArcataPet.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ArcataPet.com | www.arcatapet.com
thread.title: Mary Lou Finnegan
thread.title_full: ArcataPet.com reviewed by Mary Lou Finnegan

author: Mary Lou Finnegan
title: Mary Lou Finnegan
text: My six cats are escape artists about collars. I got them Beastie bands with Velcro closures. So far, they work. I chose patterns to match their personalities, from Cool Cat to Chinese Dragons. The package arrived one day early and contained the right collars. I'm thrilled and so are Hoover, Lincoln, Chase, Zen, Magus and T2.
